service.name: changeOwnerUponIssuance
service.description: If product store setOwnerUponIssuance is Y or empty, set the inventory item owner upon issuance.

service.name: createInventoryItemStatus
service.description: Create an inventory item status record

service.name: inventoryItemCheckSetDefaultValues
service.description: Check and, if empty, fills with default values ownerPartyId, currencyUomId, unitCost

service.name: createInventoryItemDetail
service.description: Create an createInventoryItemDetail - note that the quantityOnHand and availableToPromise are relative (positive or negative) and will be added to the corresponding value on the given InventoryItem

service.name: updateInventoryItemFromDetail
service.description: Sums all availableToPromiseDiff and quantityOnHandDiff elements for the inventoryItemId and sets the availableToPromise and quantityOnHand fields on the corresponding InventoryItem. Meant to be run as an Entity ECA triggered on any modify operation on the InventoryItemDetail entity.

service.name: updateSerializedInventoryTotals
service.description: Sets the ATP/QOH totals for serialized inventory items

service.name: createInventoryItemVariance
service.description: Create an InventoryItemVariance - note that the quantityOnHand and availableToPromise are relative and will be added to the corresponding value on the given InventoryItem

service.name: createPhysicalInventoryAndVariance
service.description: Create a PhysicalInventory and an InventoryItemVariance

service.name: getMktgPackagesAvailable
service.description: Get Marketing Packages Available From Components In Inventory

service.name: getProductInventoryAvailable
service.description: Get Inventory Availability for a Product

service.name: getInventoryAvailableByFacility
service.description: Get Inventory Availability for a Product constrained by a facilityId

service.name: getInventoryAvailableByLocation
service.description: Get Inventory Availability for a Product constrained by a facility and location

service.name: getInventoryAvailableByContainer
service.description: Get Inventory Availability for a Product constrained by a containerId

service.name: getInventoryAvailableByItem
service.description: Get Inventory Availability for an InventoryItem

service.name: getProductInventoryAvailableFromAssocProducts
service.description: Get Inventory Availability for a product based on List of associated products, usually marketing package components.

service.name: getProductInventoryAvailableBySupplier
service.description: Get Inventory Availability for a Product by a Supplier

service.name: countProductInventoryOnHand
service.description: Count Inventory On Hand for a Product constrained by a facilityId at a given date.

service.name: countProductInventoryShippedForSales
service.description: Count Inventory Shipped for Sales Orders for a Product constrained by a facilityId in a given date range.

service.name: getProductInventorySummaryForItems
service.description: Get ATP/QOH Availability for a list of OrderItems by summing over all facilities. If the item is a MARKETING_PKG_AUTO/PICK, then put its quantity available from components in the mktgPkgATPMap and mktgPkgQOHMap.

service.name: getProductInventoryAndFacilitySummary
service.description: Get ATP/QOH Availability for a list of OrderItems by summing over all facilities. If the item is a MARKETING_PKG_AUTO/PICK, then put its quantity available from components in the mktgPkgATPMap and mktgPkgQOHMap.

service.name: checkInventoryAvailability
service.description: Batch service for checking and sending backorder notifications. Will also set an autoCancelDate for sales orders to 30 days (hard coded) beyond the OISGIR's promisedDatetime, which is in turn set by reserveProductInventory service using ProductFacility.daysToShip or 30 days by default.

service.name: balanceInventoryItems
service.description: Balance inventory items based on the new item specified which will have available inventory that back-order (negative ATP) reservations can be reassigned to.

service.name: reassignInventoryReservations
service.description: Balance inventory reservations for a given product/facility, considering all the reservations with promised date greater than fromDate.

service.name: balanceOrderItemsWithNegativeReservations
service.description: For each product with a negative reservation in the order, calls reassignInventoryReservations

service.name: reserveProductInventory
service.description: Reserve Inventory for a Product. If requireInventory is Y the quantity not reserved is returned, if N then a negative availableToPromise will be used to track quantity ordered beyond what is in stock.

service.name: reserveProductInventoryByFacility
service.description: Reserve Inventory for a Product By Facility If requireInventory is Y the quantity not reserved is returned, if N then a negative availableToPromise will be used to track quantity ordered beyond what is in stock.

service.name: reserveProductInventoryByContainer
service.description: Reserve Inventory for a Product By Container If requireInventory is Y the quantity not reserved is returned, if N then a negative availableToPromise will be used to track quantity ordered beyond what is in stock.

service.name: reserveOrderItemInventory
service.description: Create OrderItemShipGrpInvRes or increment existing reserved quantity.

service.name: cancelOrderInventoryReservation
service.description: Iterates through each OrderItemShipGrpInvRes on each OrderItem for the order with the given orderId and cancels the reservation by changing the status of the OrderItemShipGrpInvRes and incrementing the corresponding non-serialized inventoryItem's availableToPromise quantity, or setting the status of the corresponding serialized inventoryItem to available.

service.name: cancelOrderItemInvResQty
service.description: Cancel a specific quantity for an order item

service.name: createInventoryTransfer
service.description: Create an inventory transfer. Uses the prepareInventoryTransfer service; see comments there about transfer quantities and inventory items.

service.name: prepareInventoryTransfer
service.description: Prepares inventory item for transfer. If the xferQty is less than quantityOnHandTotal of the inventory item, then the inventory item is "split," and an new inventory item will be created with xferQty and used for the inventory transfer.

service.name: createInventoryTransfersForProduct
service.description: Create inventory transfers for the given product and quantity. Return the units not available for transfers.

service.name: issueImmediatelyFulfilledOrder
service.description: Issues the Inventory for an Order that was Immediately Fulfilled, like in a POS environment. Note that this skips the normal inventory reservation process, and the shipment process (no shipment is created).

service.name: issueImmediatelyFulfilledOrderItem
service.description: Issues the Inventory for an Order Item that was Immediately Fulfilled for more info see the issueImmediatelyFulfilledOrder service.

service.name: createFacilityContactMechPurpose
service.description: Create a purpose for facility contact mech

service.name: deleteFacilityContactMechPurpose
service.description: Delete a purpose for facility contact mech

service.name: findStockMovesNeeded
service.description: Find all Stock Moves that need to be done. This service differs from the inventory transfer services in that it does not require sufficient availableToPromise to move the stock, in fact it is generally triggered because some promised inventory is in a bulk location and needs to be moved to a pick location.

service.name: findStockMovesRecommended
service.description: Find all Stock Moves that should be done based on minimum quantities on each Pick/Primary ProductFacilityLocation.

service.name: processPhysicalStockMove
service.description: Process a Physical Stock Move from one FacilityLocation to another, in the same Facility. This service will not only move quantities from one InventoryItem to another but it will also reassign any existing OrderItemShipGrpInvRes records to the new InventoryItem.

service.name: findProductInventorylocations
service.description: Find Product's inventory locations from facility

service.name: setLastInventoryCount
service.description: Service which run as EECA (on InventoryItemDetail entity) and updates lastInventoryCount for products available in facility in ProductFacility entity

service.name: createUpdateFacilityGeoPoint
service.description: Create or update GeoPoint assigned to facility
